Document Control.B: Record of Processing Activities Guidelines for Regulated Entities (English)
Document Control.C: Record of Processing Activities Guidelines for Regulated Entities (English)

1. Cover Sheet Template.A: The legal name of the controller
The registered address of the controller
Name of person or team responsible for data privacy in the controller's organisation
Email for the person or team responsible for data privacy in the controller's organisation
Phone number of the person or team responsible for data privacy in the controller's organisation

2. RoPA Template.Q: External Parties Personal Data is Shared With

2. RoPA Template.T: External Parties Personal Data is Shared With

2. RoPA Template.C: Name and Contact Details of the Process Owner
2. RoPA Template.F: E.g. Name, DoB, Address, Email ID, Contact Number, Bank Account Details, Passport/Visa/Work Permits, Credit Card Information etc.
2. RoPA Template.G:
Personal Data Relating to: 
Ethnic origin, Children, Health, physical or psychological condition, Religious Creeds, Marital Relations, Criminal Offences and / or Biometrics.
2. RoPA Template.H: E.g. Direct From the Individual, From a Third Party, From a Public Register etc.
2. RoPA Template.K: Additional condition for processing personal data of a special nature (if applicable)
2. RoPA Template.M:
Additional Information 
e.g. Details of Legitimate Interests or Consent

DPIA Reference

2. RoPA Template.O: Business Function / Department Personal Data is Shared With
2. RoPA Template.Q: Names or Categories of the Third Parties Personal Data is Shared With
2. RoPA Template.R:
Contract Reference 
(Where Possible, Include the Contract Reference Number(s)
2. RoPA Template.S: Does This Process Involve Any Cross-Border Data Flows? (Yes/No)
2. RoPA Template.T: Safeguards for Restricted Transfers of Personal Data to Locations Outside Qatar (incl. Qatar Free Zones) (if applicable)
2. RoPA Template.U: General Description of Administrative, Financial and Technical Precautions
2. RoPA Template.V: Retention Period (Length of Time Personal Data is Kept For)
2. RoPA Template.W: Where the Personal Data is Stored
2. RoPA Template.X: Documentation Recording Any Breaches Impacting This Process

3. Notes.A: Use this template to document the processing activities you undertake as a controller.
Headings highlighted in blue relate to information about the purpose of the processing and ownership.
Headings highlighted in the dark and light red colour relate to information about the process itself.
1.    On the template cover sheet complete the controllers details (name, address, email, and phone number) in cells C4-C7.
2.   On the template cover sheet complete the Data Privacy Ownership Details (name, email, and phone number of the person responsible for data privacy at your organisation) in cells C9 - C 11.

3.   Document your organisation’s processing activities, starting in cell C5 (in the RoPA tab), and working from left to right. Where necessary use multiple rows for each processing activity in order to be as granular as possible (see Template example and RoPA example tab).
For detailed guidance on Registers of Processing Activities (RoPAs), please see the RoPA Guidelines published by the CDP.
